attributes.action: Send people who commit crimes who are under the age of 30 into the Armed forces instead of Jail
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone who is under the age of 30 when committing a crime, instead of sending to jail force them to join one of the Armed forces, this will rehabilitate them and will cut down on the amount of people who recommit crimes when released.
